Class YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions

            • me.Abhigya.core.util.yaml.YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions

  • public class YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions
extends org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfigurationOptions
    Various settings for controlling the input and output of a YamlConfigurationComments

      • comment

        public YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions comment(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                                                java.lang.String path,
                                                java.lang.String comment)
        Sets the comment of the given path that will be applied to the top of the given path.

        This comment will be applied directly at the top of the given path. It is not required a new line (\n) at the end of the comment as it will automatically be applied, but you may include one if you wish for extra spacing.

        Null is a valid value which will indicate that no comment is to be applied at the top of the given path.

        Parameters:
        section - Section where the value of the given path is located
        path - Path of the set object
        comment - The comment
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining

      • comment

        public YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions comment(java.lang.String path,
                                                java.lang.String comment)
        Sets the comment for the desired path.

        This comment will be applied directly at the top of the given path. It is not required a new line (\n) at the end of the comment as it will automatically be applied, but you may include one if you wish for extra spacing.

        Null/Empty comment is a valid value which will indicate that no comment is to be applied at the top of the given path.

        Parameters:
        path - Path to comment.
        comment - Text of the comment.
        Returns:
        Object, for chaining.

      • isCommented

        public boolean isCommented(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                           java.lang.String path)
        Returns true if the given path is commented.

        Parameters:
        section - Section where the value of the given path is located.
        path - Path of the set object.
        Returns:
        true if commented.

      • getComment

        public java.lang.String getComment(org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection section,
                                   java.lang.String path)
        Returns the comment of the given path or null if it is not commented.

        Parameters:
        section - Section where the value of the given path is located.
        path - Path of the set object.
        Returns:
        Comment of the given path or null if not commented.

      • getComments

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getComments()
        Return all the comments of all the path of all the ConfigurationSection.

        The returned map is unmodifiable, so you should not try do modify it!

        Returns:
        All the comments of all the path of all the ConfigurationSection.

      • copyComments

        public boolean copyComments()
        Gets whether the comments of the path should be inserted at the top of the paths when saving the configuration.

        Returns:
        true if the comments are enabled.

      • copyComments

        public YamlConfigurationCommentsOptions copyComments(boolean copy)
        Sets whether or not the comments should by copied to the top of the paths when saving the configuration.

        Parameters:
        copy - true to enable the comments.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.
